title: Quantum Break

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-92.current, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: It does launch and allow me to play. The mouse movement however is buggy and barely working. Basically sometimes you move the mouse and it works the way it should and many times it is just jerky and moving all over the place. Proton 3.7-6.
title: Quantum Break

notes:
I was able to play the whole game with a xbox controller. Sometimes after playing a live action episode the game crashes. But it is not a major problem because once you restart the game it starts in the place it would be if the crash had not happened. The videos that a part of the game have no problems. Only the ones from the tv live action cause a crash.

If you put the quality on maximum you will have to play at 30 fps. Considering that this game is known for performance problems on windows the current situation is not that bad.
title: Quantum Break

notes: The game seens to work fine and renders perfectly, but the performance seens much worse than windows. Being fare this game is also known to be a graphic hog even on microsoft platform.
title: Quantum Break

notes: The Perfomance makes the game unplayable for me. Played with a Xbox One Controller.
title: Quantum Break

notes: Poor performance, around 30fps on graphic preset medium (1080p). Switching between Desktop and the game does not work properly. Mouse controls are not working properly, but playing with controller is no problem.
